item.source: How do i change the max combat level and max level in a skill?

item.title: How do i change the max combat level and max level in a skill?
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

The combat calculation can be edited through the player class, and the max levels can be changed through the getLevelForXP method.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i change the max combat level and max level in a skill?

item.title: How do i change the max combat level and max level in a skill?
item.dc:creator: @spon80 spon80
item.description:
@spon80 wrote:

do you want 138 combat level also?

if you do:

player.java search for:

int combatLevel = 0;

replace with mine

int combatLevel = 0; if (ran > attstr) { combatLevel = (int)(((double)(getLevelForXP(playerXP[1])) * 0.37) + ((double)(getLevelForXP(playerXP[3])) * 0.25) + ((double)(getLevelForXP(playerXP[5])) * 0.125) + ((double)(getLevelForXP(playerXP[6])) * 0.4875)); } else if (mag > attstr) { combatLevel = (int)(((double)(getLevelForXP(playerXP[1])) * 0.37) + ((double)(getLevelForXP(playerXP[3])) * 0.25) + ((double)(getLevelForXP(playerXP[5])) * 0.125) + ((double)(getLevelForXP(playerXP[4])) * 0.4875)); } else { combatLevel = (int)(((double)(getLevelForXP(playerXP[1])) * 0.37) + ((double)(getLevelForXP(playerXP[3])) * 0.25) + ((double)(getLevelForXP(playerXP[5])) * 0.125) + ((double)(getLevelForXP(playerXP[0])) * 0.325) + ((double)(getLevelForXP(playerXP[2])) * 0.325)); }

item.title: How do i change the max combat level and max level in a skill?
item.dc:creator: @purefrostiee purefrostiee
item.description:
@purefrostiee wrote:

try }

  for (int i=0; i<playerLevel.length; i++) { //Setting Levels
     if (i == 3) {
        playerLevel = 99;[size=20pt]change the 99![/size]
        playerXP = 5000;
     } else {
        playerLevel = 1;
        playerXP = 0;
     }
  }

and this

}
public int getLevelForXP(int exp) {
int points = 0;
int output = 0;

  for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= 99; lvl++) {
     points += Math.floor((double)lvl + 300.0 * Math.pow(2.0, (double)lvl / 7.0));
     output = (int)Math.floor(points / 4);
     if (output >= exp)
        return lvl

If you change that 99, it should work change your max level for the skill…

item.title: How do i change the max combat level and max level in a skill?
item.dc:creator: @madmanisbad2 madmanisbad2
item.description:
@madmanisbad2 wrote:

i have smdscape scource and cant figure out how to change it because well look at code below…

My player.java

	}

	for (int i=0; i<playerLevel.length; i++) { //Setting Levels
		if (i == 3) {
			playerLevel[i] = 99;
			playerXP[i] = 5000;
		} else {
			playerLevel[i] = 1;
			playerXP[i] = 0;
		}
	}

and this

}
public int getLevelForXP(int exp) {
	int points = 0;
	int output = 0;

	for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= 99; lvl++) {
		points += Math.floor((double)lvl + 300.0 * Math.pow(2.0, (double)lvl / 7.0));
		output = (int)Math.floor(points / 4);
		if (output >= exp)
			return lvl;

=] help please
